amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 8015 of the bill which prohibits the Department of Defense from contracting out any function unless it will save a minimum of $10 million or 10 percent of the Department's performance costs even if the contractor is less costly overall and can perform the work more efficiently.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 62 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 8015 of the bill.
